channel.title: Travel Demand on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Travel Demand on FinanClub

item.title: 0681 EXPE
item.description: score:681 Chances: Expedia Group, Inc. beat earnings expectations in the second quarter of 2023, with reported EPS of $2.89, higher than the expected $2.32. Earnings reports from online travel companies, including Expedia, show that consumers are willing to pay higher prices for international summer trips, indicating strengthening travel demand.

item.title: 0940 DAL
item.description: score:940 Chances: Delta Air Lines could benefit from the rise in international travel demand as more Americans are opting for longer journeys overseas. Strong leisure travel demand is positive for U.S. airlines, including Delta Air Lines, as the market begins to recover from notable losses.

item.title: 1026 NCLH
item.description: score:1026 Chances: Norwegian Cruise Line posted its first profit since Covid, indicating a potential recovery in the cruise industry amid a boom in summer travel demand. Cruise stocks like Norwegian Cruise Line, Royal Caribbean Cruises, and Carnival are likely to benefit from rising personal income and personal spending.
